title: No convincing evidence that homeopathy can help with cancer treatment side effects - Cancer Research UK - Cancer News
author: Kat Arney
description: Treating cancer can be gruelling, and patients often suffer side effects as a result of modern treatments. This is because it is very difficult to accurately target drugs or radiotherapy specifically to cancer cells. And because these treatments have powerful biological effects on cells, there is an inherent risk that healthy cells may also be [...]
